topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mailing List Servers

name: Xataface Email Module
short_description: A module for Xataface to add mailing list capability to applications.  Email can be sent to any found set, and any table can be treated as a mailing list, as long as each record contains an email address.
